titles.title: 233 Whom Have I, Lord, In Heav'n But Thee (pleasan

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Whom have I Lord
In heav'n but Thee
None but Thee
None but Thee
And this my song thru life shall be
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
He hath for me
The serpent trod
He hath redeemed me
By His blood
And reconciled my soul to God
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I envy not the rich their joys
Christ for me
Christ for me
I covet not
Earth's glitt'ring toys
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Earth can no lasting bliss bestow
Fading is stamped on all below
Mine is a joy
No end can know
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Though with the poor be cast my lot
Christ for me
Christ for me
He knoweth best
I murmur not
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Though vine and fig-tree
Blight assail
The labor of the olive fail
And death o'er flock and herd prevail
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Though I am now on hostile ground
Christ for me
Christ for me
And sin beset me all around
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Let earth her fiercest battles wage
And foes against my soul engage
Strong in His strength I scorn their rage
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
And when my life draw to its close
Christ for me
Christ for me
Safe in His arms I shall repose
Christ for me
Christ for me

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
When sharpest pains my frame pervade
And all the powers of nature fade
Still will I sing through death's cold shade
Christ for me
Christ for me
